Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Schluter Smart Thermostat Skill and Alexa, you can interact with your Schluter DITRA-HEAT-E-RS1 devices even your scenes.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your Schluter Smart Thermostat account and say, "Alexa, discover devices.” 

The Schluter Smart Thermostat Skill is only compatible with devices connected to a Sinopé gateway or Sinopé Wi-Fi devices. 

Scenes: 
To control scenes, simply tell Alexa to turn on <scene name>. 
- "Alexa, turn on Relax."
- "Alexa, turn on Energize.”
 
You can create your scenes on the Schluter Smart Thermostat app! Once your new scenes are created, simply ask "Alexa, discover devices" to have them work with Amazon Alexa.

Rooms: 
To control several thermostats in the same room, simply tell Alexa to change the temperature in <room name>. 
- “Alexa, set the bedroom temperature to 77.”
- “Alexa, lower the temperature in bathroom by 2”.
 
To define rooms:
- Create an Alexa group and add the device(s) to the group in the Alexa App.
 
- You can set the temperature to different values, for example: « Alexa, set kitchen temperature to 77 degrees » or « Alexa, make bedroom warmer .»
